name: Operation Lockdown (Vladislav Zharkov)
description:
A private military group has taken over a secret research facility in an attempt to steal experimental cloning technology. Your mission is to fight your way down to the underground labs, eliminate all threats and collect secret files.

Features:

  • High definition 3D graphics
  • Realistic sound effects
  • Intense soundtrack by an award winning composer
  • 5 levels, 5 enemies, and 3 weapons

Known Issues:

Some people have reported mouse sensitivity issues. To fix this, follow these steps:

  1. In the "data" folder, right click the "lockdown.exe" and then go to Properties
  2. Under the Compatibility tab click the "Change High DPI Settings" button
  3. Tick both boxes for "Program DPI" and "High DPI Scaling Behavior"

The game might appear blurry on NVIDIA cards. To fix this you have to turn off enhancement settings for this game.

This game was made over the course of a few weeks using Raycasting Game Maker v5 for E1M1 Game Jam 2021. It was somewhat inspired by the notorious Operation Body Count game by Capstone Software aka the pinnacle of entertainment software.
